menu.label: Cancel temp targets
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/  oref0-append-local-temptarget 0 0 | tee -a /var/log/openaps/menu.log | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Eating Soon: 60m@80
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/  oref0-append-local-temptarget 80 60 | tee -a /var/log/openaps/menu.log | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Speaking: 45m@110
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ oref0-append-local-temptarget 110 45 | tee -a /var/log/openaps/menu.log | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Walking: 45m@120
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/  oref0-append-local-temptarget 120 45 | tee -a /var/log/openaps/menu.log | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Running: 1h@140
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/  oref0-append-local-temptarget 140 60 | tee -a /var/log/openaps/menu.log | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Dancing: 3h@140
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/  oref0-append-local-temptarget 140 180 | tee -a /var/log/openaps/menu.log | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8
